subject: Use of NHAI Tag Line on Publicity material
text: HRr <ey TTTAf wifearrut 34 / Phone 91-11,25074100/25074200 (e WTR7 3 Trottrtf 17174) Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) #-5 0 6, #zr-10, aa, #farft-110075 6-5 & 6. Sector-10, Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn Dated: 16.02.2016 PQLCY MAILERS Administration[Elnance (169/2016) (Decision taken in File No.11041/35/18-MR) Subject: Use of NHAI Tag Line on Publicity material It has been decided that all the tender   notices/advertisements/audio presentations and other publicity material shall bear the tag line Gs under video English: Building a Nation, Not Just Roads; Hindi: Hsa & &, To T @aaot % 2_ Inthe above text, font size of 'Building a Nalion' shall be 2 points that text size of 'Not Just Roads' in English and Hindi, as indicated bigger the above (AK. Sadhu) CGM (Coord:) To: All Officers & Employees of HQ/ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices 7a4 / 677d NHAL
